Completion of Minimum University Require: Minimum 120 credits and minimum GPA of 2.0
Completion of 45 upper-level credits, residence requirement, Writing Intensive requirement, and General Education requirement

Major Requirements: Minimum grade of 'C' in courses applied to the major, except where otherwise indicated
The Jazz Studies, B.A. is available only for instrumentalists, not for vocalists.

Complete the following, including MUSC 1: MUSC 125 - Theory I: Basics of Music (3)
MUSC 126 - Theory II: Form and Analysis (3)

Complete the following:: MUSC 221 - Jazz Theory and Aural Skills (3)
MUSC 480 - Topics in Music, Art and Society (3)

Complete 12 credits from the following:: MUSC 193 - Private Lessons for Music Majors (3)

Complete 6 credits of the following:: MUSC 390 - Advanced Private Lessons for Music Majors (3)

Complete the following:: MUSC 391 - Advanced Private Lessons for Music Majors - Junior Recital (3)
MUSC 392 - Advanced Private Lessons for Music Majors - Senior Recital (3)
